post:
A KVM VPS is like running your very own dedicated server, you have secure isolated resources dedicated right to you only, guaranteeing exactly what you have brought, unlike OpenVZ which can be oversold, giving you an unreliable experience as the kernel is sheard, where as KVM you have the choice as it's all allocated to you, mount up a new ISO, use Microsoft Windows to power your new experience, or any Linux distribution you wish, your in complete control of your new server.

 

With our amazing 24x7 support option's available to you, the best IP allocations - you can be assured that your next KVM experience is with MyServerPlanet, of which we strive for customer satisfaction while using our services, all of our services come with 1Gbit of connectivity to your new service which is based in One Wiltshire in LA.

 

We have five, fully customisable KVM plans to meet your specification - Everything is fully customisable to your needs!
